item.description: Formed in 1986, The Floyd Patterson Band has been regarded by many over the years to be a Pioneer Valley Favorite. With material ranging from the 1950's to present, the group always brings home their own style of quality peformance. Whether "old school" or "new school" music, state fairs or private situations, The Floyd Patterson Band never fails to keep their audiences satisfied as evidenced by the awards they've recieved in past years. Anyone I know who has seen this band has always given it rave reviews. Pazzo Ristorante is a chic and trendy club restauraunt in the renovated riverfront district of Springfield. It is near the Basketball Hall of Fame. More info can be found at www.pazzohof.com It is highly recommended by members of our group. We will meet an hour before the entertainment at the bar to enjoy a few drinks. This event will be a night to remember....
item.name: Floyd Patterson Band at Pazzos
